summary: Core romantic single-page UI appears to be implemented in `frontend/src/App.tsx` with a warm theme (`frontend/src/index.css`) and at least two interactions (Collapsible + Dialog). However, the required generated image assets are not present in the diff, and several unrequested/auth-related and backend files were added despite being out of scope / non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the page.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references `/assets/generated/...png` paths, but no files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` are shown as added in the diff summary, so the required images themselves are not evidenced as present.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/implemented Internet Identity authentication context and actor recreation logic, despite authentication/user accounts being a non-goal and not required for this romantic page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity authentication/user accounts as non-goals and states interactions should not require login/backend calls, yet new II provider/hook files and actor logic were added and wired into the app entry.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend canister file even though the request states no backend work is required and to avoid extra backend services.
hallucinated_features.reason: A new backend file was introduced (`actor {}`) despite the request indicating no backend work is required for this change.
